Desc.eng: Bah! They all forgot that monsters are dangerous! That’s what peace does to you.
Is there anyone who can tell me more about Borgova?
Talk to the alchemist… if you can. But the Romany travellers put a curse on him, so he can’t speak anymore.
Oh, they love curses! It’s nice to see that they are sticking to tradition.
Katarina, please. How can I help that poor man?
Go to the Romany tribe and ask them to remove the curse.
